name.value: HSPC Revised Geneva Score Pain on Deep Palpation and Unilateral Lower Limb Edema Values

description.value: The codes that represent the numeric values for pain on deep palpation and unilateral lower limb edema for the Revised Geneva Score.

definition.value: A numeric value of zero assigned to a specific observation for the Revised Geneva Score predictive tool.
A numeric value of four assigned to a specific observation for the Revised Geneva Score predictive tool.
